mapper.select: SELECT QNA_NUM, MEMBER_NUM, STAFF_NUMBER, QNA_DATE, QNA_SUBJECT, QNA_CONTENT, QNA_FILE, QNA_PW, QNA_COUNT FROM QNA
SELECT REVIEW_NUM, PKG_NUM, MEMBER_NUM, REVIEW_DATE, REVIEW_CONTENT, REVIEW_FILE, REVIEW_PW, REVIEW_COUNT, REVIEW_RATING FROM REVIEW
SELECT NOTICE_NUM, STAFF_NUMBER, NOTICE_DATE, NOTICE_SUBJECT, NOTICE_CONTENT, NOTICE_FILE, NOTICE_PW, NOTICE_COUNT FROM NOTICE
mapper.insert: insert into QNA(QNA_NUM, MEMBER_NUM, STAFF_NUMBER, QNA_DATE, QNA_SUBJECT, QNA_CONTENT, QNA_FILE, QNA_PW, QNA_COUNT) values((select count(qna_num)+1 from QNA), #{memberNum}, #{staffNumber}, #{qnaDate}, #{qnaSubject}, #{qnaContent}, #{qnaFile}, #{qnaPw},#{qnaCount})

insert into REVIEW(REVIEW_NUM, PKG_NUM, MEMBER_NUM, REVIEW_DATE, REVIEW_CONTENT, REVIEW_FILE, REVIEW_PW, REVIEW_COUNT, REVIEW_RATING) values((select count(REVIEW_NUM)+1 from REVIEW), #{pkgNum}, #{memberNum}, #{reviewDate}, #{reviewContent}, #{reviewFile}, #{reviewPw}, #{reviewCount},#{reviewRating})

insert into NOTICE(NOTICE_NUM, STAFF_NUMBER, NOTICE_DATE, NOTICE_SUBJECT, NOTICE_CONTENT, NOTICE_FILE, NOTICE_PW, NOTICE_COUNT) values((select count(NOTICE_NUM)+1 from NOTICE), #{staffNumber}, #{noticeDate}, #{noticeSubject}, #{noticeContent}, #{noticeFile}, #{noticePw}, #{noticeCount})
mapper.select:
